import { useState } from 'react'; import Cookies from 'js-cookie'; // Import the js-cookie library function SectionCaneducationCategory() { const [educationC, seteducationCategory] = useState({ educationCategory: '', // Correct field name course: '', university: '', }); const handleInputChange = (e) => { const { name, value } = e.target; seteducationCategory((prevState) => ({ ...prevState, [name]: value, })); }; const handleSave = async () => { const userId = Cookies.get('candidateId'); // Fetching userId from cookies if (!userId) { console.error('User ID not found. Please log in again.'); return; } try { const response = await fetch('http://localhost:8080/resume-educationCategory', { // Use '/resume-educationCategory' here method: 'POST', headers: { 'Content-Type': 'application/json', }, body: JSON.stringify({ educationCategory: [educationCategory], // Send educationCategory data as an array }), credentials: 'include', }); const data = await response.json(); console.log(data); // Log the response data if (response.ok) { console.log('educationCategory details saved successfully!'); seteducationCategory({ educationCategory: '', course: '', university: '' }); // Clear the form } else { console.error(data.message || 'Error saving educationCategory details'); } } catch (error) { console.error('Error saving educationCategory details:', error); } }; return ( <>
